title: Songs VII
text:
between green
              mountains
sings the flinger
of

fire   beyond red rivers
of fair perpetual
feet the
sinuous

        riot

the
flashing
bacchant.

partedpetaled
mouth,face
delirious.   indivisible
grace

      of dancing
seo_description: A poem by E. E. Cummings in “XLI Poems”
